A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Meh. Ugh. Errr. This had pacing issues. The cinematography was second to none. The 'spoilers' were ok. I am not upset about them the way some people are. 

Many complain about it being too 'jokey'\, I thought it was a huge downer! We needed more jokes!

The theme seems to be\, as many reviewers stated\, 'egalatarianism'- the problem is that they shovel that stuff down your throat more than they did midiachlorians in the prequels! Where is the hope in this movie!? It's not dark\, it's just super depressing! Enlighten me! Don't bum me out!

As where in empire\, I feel that at the end we licked our wounds and lessons were learned\, this one feels like a funeral!

I don't know. I think I need to buy some deathsticks and rethink my life. :-/
